name: Hi, I'm Lucas
presentation: I am a Computer Science student and web developer in training, focusing on the JavaScript ecosystem, studying and developing projects with JavaScript, TypeScript, React.js, and Next.js.
passion: Front-end Developer with 1 year of experience developing interfaces for management systems, using JavaScript, TypeScript, React.js, and modern front-end ecosystem technologies. Experience working on a real-world project in the public sector, contributing to the digitization and organization of approximately 10,000 boxes of documents, focusing on usability, performance, and integration with REST APIs, resulting in greater operational efficiency and a reduction in manual processes.
work_experiences: Front-end Trainee Developer at Property and Materials Management Division of the Municipality of Ubá.
desc_experiences: Responsible for front-end development and the creation and integration of REST APIs.
document_manager_description: I participated in an extension project for the Computer Science course with the goal of developing document management and control software, aimed at optimizing the processes of the Assets and Materials Administration Division of the Municipality of Ubá.
crypto_vision_description: I developed a web application for real-time cryptocurrency monitoring, displaying updated prices, price fluctuation charts, and detailed information about each asset.
verbo_app_description: I developed an AI-powered chatbot integrated with the OpenAI API, capable of answering questions in real time using natural language. The project features communication via REST API, a responsive interface, and a ready-made base inspired by Christian principles, clearly prioritizing accessibility and a good user experience.
moodflix_description: I developed an intuitive movie viewing and recommendation system.
ecommerce_description: I developed an e-commerce platform as a practical project to apply web development concepts and understand the workflow of an e-commerce application.
